quote e: Every day is a fresh start.
quote c: 每一天都是全新的開始。
author: Unknown

quote e: Small steps every day lead to big change.
quote c: 每天的小步前進，會帶來巨大的改變。
author: Unknown

quote e: Believe you can and you are halfway there.
quote c: 相信你做得到，你就已經成功了一半。
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote e: Progress not perfection.
quote c: 追求進步，而非完美。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your effort today shapes your tomorrow.
quote c: 你今天的努力，正在塑造你的明天。
author: Unknown

quote e: Dream big start small act now.
quote c: 夢想要大，起步要小，行動要快。

quote e: Challenges are chances to grow.
quote c: 挑戰就是成長的機會。

quote e: Be the reason someone smiles today.
quote c: 成為讓別人今天微笑的理由。

quote e: Success is built on consistency.
quote c: 成功是靠持續累積出來的。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do what you can with what you have where you are.
quote c: 用你所擁有的，在你所在的位置，做你能做的事。
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote e: The future depends on what you do today.
quote c: 未來取決於你今天做了什麼。

quote e: You are stronger than you think.
quote c: 你比自己想像的還要強大。

quote e: Focus on the step in front of you.
quote c: 專注於眼前的下一步。
author: Unknown

quote e: It always seems impossible until it is done.
quote c: 在完成之前，一切看起來都不可能。

quote e: Courage is trying one more time.
quote c: 勇氣就是再嘗試一次。

quote e: Keep going you are getting there.
quote c: 繼續走，你正在到達。
author: Unknown

quote e: Mistakes are proof that you are learning.
quote c: 犯錯是你正在學習的證明。

quote e: Start where you are.
quote c: 從你現在的位置開始。

quote e: You do not have to be great to start.
quote c: 你不必很厲害才開始。

quote e: A little progress each day adds up.
quote c: 每天一點點進步，就會累積成大成就。

quote e: Hard work beats talent when talent does not work hard.
quote c: 當天賦不努力時，努力就會贏過天賦。

quote e: The best time to begin is now.
quote c: 最好的開始時間就是現在。

quote e: Your only limit is your mind.
quote c: 你的限制只存在於你的想法。
author: Unknown

quote e: Stay positive work hard make it happen.
quote c: 保持正向，努力去做，讓它成真。

quote e: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quote c: 領先的祕訣就是開始。

quote e: Be proud of how far you have come.
quote c: 為你走到今天的自己感到驕傲。

quote e: You can do hard things.
quote c: 你做得到那些不容易的事。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do your best and let it grow.
quote c: 盡力而為，讓成果自然成長。
author: Unknown

quote e: Push yourself because no one else will.
quote c: 推自己一把，因為沒有人會替你做。
author: Unknown

quote e: Turn setbacks into comeback.
quote c: 把挫折變成逆轉的力量。
author: Unknown

quote e: Believe in your growth.
quote c: 相信自己的成長。
author: Unknown

quote e: Stay curious and keep learning.
quote c: 保持好奇，不斷學習。
author: Unknown

quote e: Great things take time.
quote c: 偉大的事情需要時間。
author: Unknown

quote e: One day or day one you decide.
quote c: 要嘛有一天，要嘛第一天，由你決定。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your pace is still progress.
quote c: 你的步調仍然是進步。
author: Unknown

quote e: Practice makes progress.
quote c: 練習帶來進步。
author: Unknown

quote e: The climb is tough but the view is worth it.
quote c: 路途辛苦，但風景值得。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do not quit you are closer than you think.
quote c: 別放棄，你比想像中更接近了。
author: Unknown

quote e: Learn from yesterday live for today hope for tomorrow.
quote c: 從昨天學習，為今天而活，對明天懷抱希望。

quote e: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
quote c: 每個成就都從「願意試試看」開始。

quote e: You are capable of amazing things.
quote c: 你有能力做到很棒的事。
author: Unknown

quote e: Choose progress over comfort.
quote c: 選擇進步，而不是安逸。
author: Unknown

quote e: The only way to fail is to stop trying.
quote c: 停止嘗試，才是真正的失敗。
author: Unknown

quote e: A positive mind finds opportunity.
quote c: 正向的心會找到機會。
author: Unknown

quote e: Give yourself credit for trying.
quote c: 為自己的努力給自己肯定。
author: Unknown

quote e: What you repeat you become.
quote c: 你重複做的事，會成為你的樣子。
author: Unknown

quote e: The way you speak to yourself matters.
quote c: 你對自己說的話很重要。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep your face to the sunshine.
quote c: 讓臉朝向陽光，陰影就會在後面。
author: Helen Keller

quote e: Today is your chance to get better.
quote c: 今天就是你變得更好的機會。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep moving forward.
quote c: 持續向前走。
author: Walt Disney

quote e: You are allowed to be a beginner.
quote c: 你可以從新手開始。
author: Unknown

quote e: Success comes from showing up daily.
quote c: 成功來自每天都願意出現。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your actions today create your story.
quote c: 你今天的行動正在寫下你的故事。
author: Unknown

quote e: Be patient with yourself.
quote c: 對自己多一點耐心。
author: Unknown

quote e: Try again with new strength.
quote c: 帶著新的力量再試一次。
author: Unknown

quote e: The effort you give is never wasted.
quote c: 你的努力從不會白費。
author: Unknown

quote e: Every step counts.
quote c: 每一步都算數。
author: Unknown

quote e: You grow through what you go through.
quote c: 你走過的路，會讓你成長。
author: Unknown

quote e: Make today meaningful.
quote c: 讓今天變得有意義。
author: Unknown

quote e: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quote c: 「內在成就，將改變外在現實。」
author: Plutarch

quote e: Believe in the power of yet.
quote c: 相信「還沒」的力量。
author: Unknown

quote e: Even slow progress is progress.
quote c: 就算慢，還是在前進。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your best is enough.
quote c: 你的盡力就已經足夠。
author: Unknown

quote e: A good attitude changes everything.
quote c: 好心態能改變一切。
author: Unknown

quote e: The more you practice the better you get.
quote c: 你越練習，就越進步。
author: Unknown

quote e: Don’t be afraid to start over.
quote c: 別害怕重新開始。
author: Unknown

quote e: Success is a journey.
quote c: 成功是一段旅程。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are learning more than you know.
quote c: 你正在學到比你想像更多的東西。
author: Unknown

quote e: Work hard and be kind.
quote c: 努力，也要善良。
author: Unknown

quote e: Stay focused and stay humble.
quote c: 保持專注，也保持謙遜。

quote e: Your mindset is your superpower.
quote c: 你的心態就是你的超能力。
author: Unknown

quote e: Take it one step at a time.
quote c: 一步一步來。
author: Unknown

quote e: There is joy in the process.
quote c: 過程裡也有喜悅。

quote e: You can improve every day.
quote c: 你每天都可以更好一點。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do not compare your chapter one to someone else’s chapter twenty.
quote c: 別拿你的第一章去比別人的第二十章。

quote e: Success starts with self-discipline.
quote c: 成功從自律開始。

quote e: You are not behind.
quote c: 你沒有落後。

quote e: Consistency creates confidence.
quote c: 持續會帶來自信。

quote e: Be brave enough to learn.
quote c: 勇敢去學習。
author: Unknown

quote e: Let your goals pull you forward.
quote c: 讓目標拉著你往前。
author: Unknown

quote e: Fall seven times stand up eight.
quote c: 跌倒七次，站起來八次。

quote e: Effort opens doors.
quote c: 努力會打開機會的大門。

quote e: You have what it takes.
quote c: 你具備成功所需的一切。

quote e: Stay steady stay strong.
quote c: 保持穩定，保持堅強。

quote e: Turn your can’t into can.
quote c: 把「我不行」變成「我可以」。

quote e: The habit of effort builds success.
quote c: 努力的習慣會堆出成功。

quote e: Your future self will thank you.
quote c: 未來的你會感謝現在的你。

quote e: Learning is your advantage.
quote c: 學習就是你的優勢。
author: Unknown

quote e: You make progress by practicing.
quote c: 你靠練習來進步。
author: Unknown

quote e: Start small but start now.
quote c: 從小開始，但現在就開始。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your kindness is your strength.
quote c: 善良也是一種力量。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do something today your future will smile about.
quote c: 做一件未來會讓你微笑的事。
author: Unknown

quote e: Confidence grows with action.
quote c: 自信會在行動中長大。
author: Unknown

quote e: The goal is to be better than yesterday.
quote c: 目標是比昨天更好。
author: Unknown

quote e: Never stop improving.
quote c: 永遠不要停止進步。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are building your ability.
quote c: 你正在打造自己的能力。
author: Unknown

quote e: One good choice can change your day.
quote c: 一個好選擇就能改變你的一天。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep your hopes high and your effort higher.
quote c: 保持高希望，也付出更高努力。
author: Unknown

quote e: Trust the process.
quote c: 相信過程。
author: Unknown

quote e: Believe in yourself a little more each day.
quote c: 每天多相信自己一點點。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are closer than you were yesterday.
quote c: 你比昨天更接近目標了。

quote e: Your potential is endless.
quote c: 你的潛力沒有極限。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do the next right thing.
quote c: 做下一件正確的事。
author: Unknown

quote e: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated.
quote c: 成功是無數次小努力的總和。

quote e: Your courage inspires your future.
quote c: 你的勇氣正在鼓舞未來的你。
author: Unknown

quote e: Nothing changes if nothing changes.
quote c: 如果什麼都不改變，就什麼都不會改變。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep showing up for yourself.
quote c: 持續為自己出現、為自己努力。
author: Unknown

quote e: You learn by doing.
quote c: 你會在行動中學會。
author: Unknown

quote e: Make mistakes and make progress.
quote c: 犯錯也在進步。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your dreams are worth the work.
quote c: 你的夢想值得你努力。
author: Unknown

quote e: Every moment is a chance to improve.
quote c: 每一刻都是變得更好的機會。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do not fear failure fear not trying.
quote c: 別怕失敗，怕的是不去嘗試。

quote e: Great effort brings great reward.
quote c: 大努力會帶來大收穫。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are growing even when it feels slow.
quote c: 就算覺得慢，你也在成長。
author: Unknown

quote e: The first step is always the hardest.
quote c: 第一步永遠最難，但最重要。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your work matters.
quote c: 你的努力很重要。
author: Unknown

quote e: Be consistent and results will come.
quote c: 持續做，成果自然會來。
author: Unknown

quote e: A calm mind is a strong mind.
quote c: 平靜的心就是強大的心。

quote e: Success loves preparation.
quote c: 成功偏愛有準備的人。

quote e: You are writing your own future.
quote c: 你正在寫下自己的未來。

quote e: Take pride in your progress.
quote c: 為自己的進步感到驕傲。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep learning keep rising.
quote c: 一直學習，一直向上。
author: Unknown

quote e: Every expert was once a beginner.
quote c: 每位專家都曾是新手。

quote e: It is okay to take breaks not to give up.
quote c: 休息可以，但別放棄。

quote e: Your attitude decides your direction.
quote c: 你的態度決定你的方向。

quote e: Be stronger than your excuses.

quote e: You can start again anytime.
quote c: 你隨時都可以重新開始。

quote e: Work in silence let success speak.

quote e: Difficult roads lead to beautiful places.
quote c: 艱難的路，會通往美麗的地方。

quote e: You are becoming what you practice.
quote c: 你正在成為你每天練習的樣子。

quote e: Choose to be hopeful.

quote e: Do your best today and improve tomorrow.
quote c: 今天盡力，明天更好。

quote e: The ripple of effort reaches far.
quote c: 努力的漣漪會傳得很遠。

quote e: One step forward is still forward.
quote c: 向前一步就是進步。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are not alone in learning.
quote c: 學習路上你不孤單。

quote e: Make your effort your habit.
quote c: 把努力變成習慣。
author: Unknown

quote e: Confidence comes from preparation.
quote c: 自信來自準備。
author: Unknown

quote e: Be proud of your courage to try.
quote c: 為你願意嘗試的勇氣驕傲。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your future is built today.
quote c: 你的未來正在今天被打造。
author: Unknown

quote e: Stay kind to your mind.
quote c: 對自己的心溫柔一點。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep your goals clear and your heart steady.
quote c: 目標清楚，心就穩。
author: Unknown

quote e: Every challenge teaches you something.
quote c: 每個挑戰都在教你一件事。
author: Unknown

quote e: You can do more than you think.
quote c: 你能做到的比你想的更多。
author: Unknown

quote e: Let effort be your language.
quote c: 用努力說話。
author: Unknown

quote e: You improve when you persist.
quote c: 你在堅持中變強。
author: Unknown

quote e: Make today count.
quote c: 讓今天有價值。
author: Unknown

quote e: Stay open to growth.
quote c: 保持對成長的開放。
author: Unknown

quote e: The best view comes after the hardest climb.
quote c: 最好的風景在最難的攀登之後。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep your eyes on the goal not the obstacles.
quote c: 把眼光放在目標上，而不是障礙上。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are capable of learning anything.
quote c: 你有能力學會任何事。
author: Unknown

quote e: Step by step you will get there.
quote c: 一步一步，你會到達。
author: Unknown

quote e: Energy flows where attention goes.
quote c: 注意力在哪裡，能量就往哪裡走。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your effort is your power.
quote c: 你的努力就是你的力量。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do something small today for a better tomorrow.
quote c: 今天做一件小事，明天就會更好。
author: Unknown

quote e: Every try makes you stronger.
quote c: 每一次嘗試都讓你更強。
author: Unknown

quote e: Give your best and trust your growth.
quote c: 盡全力，也相信自己會成長。
author: Unknown

quote e: You do not need to be perfect to be improving.
quote c: 不用完美，也能持續變好。
author: Unknown

quote e: The journey teaches as much as the destination.
quote c: 旅程帶來的學習不亞於終點。
author: Unknown

quote e: A good start begins with courage.
quote c: 好的開始源自勇氣。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your focus builds your future.
quote c: 你的專注正在建造未來。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep practicing and you will surprise yourself.
quote c: 持續練習，你會驚豔自己。
author: Unknown

quote e: You can handle this moment.
quote c: 你可以好好面對這一刻。
author: Unknown

quote e: Every day you get a little better.
quote c: 每天都會更進步一點。
author: Unknown

quote e: Let your effort be louder than your doubts.
quote c: 讓努力大聲過你的懷疑。
author: Unknown

quote e: Be curious and fearless.
quote c: 保持好奇，也要無所畏懼。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are allowed to take your time.
quote c: 你可以用自己的步調慢慢來。
author: Unknown

quote e: What matters is that you keep going.
quote c: 重要的是你持續前進。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your consistency will pay off.
quote c: 你的持續終將有回報。
author: Unknown

quote e: Learning today leads to success tomorrow.
quote c: 今天的學習會通往明天的成功。
author: Unknown

quote e: Stay hopeful and work steadily.
quote c: 保持希望，穩穩努力。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are making progress even on hard days.
quote c: 就算很難的日子，你也在進步。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your effort shows your character.
quote c: 你的努力展現你的品格。
author: Unknown

quote e: Choose bravery over comfort.
quote c: 選擇勇敢，而不是安逸。
author: Unknown

quote e: You can learn from everything.
quote c: 你可以從一切中學到東西。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep a learner’s heart.
quote c: 保持學習者的心。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are not defined by one bad day.
quote c: 你不會被某一天的失誤定義。
author: Unknown

quote e: Every practice is a step forward.
quote c: 每一次練習都是向前一步。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do the work and the confidence will follow.
quote c: 先去做，自信就會跟上。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your discipline is your freedom.
quote c: 自律帶來自由。
author: Unknown

quote e: Success grows from daily routines.
quote c: 成功長在每天的日常裡。
author: Unknown

quote e: You can always improve with time.
quote c: 隨著時間，你一定會更好。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your mind deserves encouragement.
quote c: 你的心也值得被鼓勵。
author: Unknown

quote e: Start simple stay steady.
quote c: 簡單開始，穩定前行。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your progress is your victory.
quote c: 你的進步就是你的勝利。
author: Unknown

quote e: Trust yourself to figure it out.
quote c: 相信自己能找到方法。
author: Unknown

quote e: Do not rush do not stop.
quote c: 不必急，但別停。
author: Unknown

quote e: Every new day brings new strength.
quote c: 每個新的一天都帶來新的力量。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are building a better you.
quote c: 你正在打造更好的自己。
author: Unknown

quote e: It is never too late to learn.
quote c: 學習永遠不嫌晚。
author: Unknown

quote e: The more you try the more you grow.
quote c: 你越嘗試，就越成長。
author: Unknown

quote e: Keep your standards high and your spirit higher.
quote c: 標準要高，心氣更要高。
author: Unknown

quote e: One small win can fuel the next.
quote c: 一個小小的成功能推動下一步。
author: Unknown

quote e: You are doing better than you think.
quote c: 你比你想的做得更好。
author: Unknown

quote e: Practice with purpose.
quote c: 帶著目標去練習。
author: Unknown

quote e: Be proud of your effort today.
quote c: 為你今天的努力感到驕傲。
author: Unknown

quote e: Your perseverance is your strength.
quote c: 你的堅持就是你的力量。
author: Unknown

quote e: Stay gentle with yourself keep moving.
quote c: 溫柔對待自己，繼續前進。
author: Unknown

quote e: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quote c: 「做出偉大工作的唯一方法，就是熱愛你所做的事。」
author: Steve Jobs

quote e: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quote c: 「走得慢沒關係，只要你不停下來。」
author: Confucius

quote e: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quote c: 「成功不是終點，失敗也不是末日，重要的是繼續前進的勇氣。」
author: Winston Churchill

quote e: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quote c: 「相信你做得到，你就成功了一半。」
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote e: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quote c: 「從你所在之處開始，用你擁有的資源，做你能做的事。」
author: Arthur Ashe

quote e: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quote c: 「你想要的一切，都在恐懼的另一端。」
author: George Addair

quote e: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quote c: 「別盯著時鐘，做它做的事——繼續走。」
author: Sam Levenson

quote e: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quote c: 「做事要相信自己正在帶來改變——因為你真的有。」
author: William James

quote e: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quote c: 「新的一天帶來新的力量與新的想法。」
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote e: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quote c: 「品質不是一個行動，而是一種習慣。」
author: Aristotle

quote e: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quote c: 「你不出手，就會錯過百分之百的機會。」
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote e: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quote c: 「在完成以前，一切看起來都不可能。」
author: Nelson Mandela

quote e: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quote c: 「用你所擁有的，在你所在的位置，做你能做的事。」
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote e: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
quote c: 「快樂不是偶然，而是選擇。」
author: Jim Rohn

quote e: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
quote c: 「你覺得你行或不行，你都說對了。」
author: Henry Ford

quote e: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quote c: 「只要你能夢想，就能做到。」
author: Walt Disney

quote e: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quote c: 「跌倒七次，站起來八次。」
author: Japanese Proverb

quote e: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quote c: 「人生 10% 是遭遇，90% 是反應。」
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote e: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quote c: 「預測未來最好的方法，就是創造它。」
author: Peter Drucker

quote e: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quote c: 「成功是每天重複的小努力累積而成。」
author: Robert Collier

quote e: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quote c: 「做你自己，因為別人都已經有人當了。」
author: Oscar Wilde

quote e: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quote c: 「別讓害怕失敗阻止你上場。」
author: Babe Ruth

quote e: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quote c: 「你的時間有限，別浪費在活成別人的樣子。」
author: Steve Jobs

quote e: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quote c: 「教育是改變世界最有力的武器。」
author: Nelson Mandela

quote e: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quote c: 「不要只追求成功，而要成為有價值的人。」
author: Albert Einstein

quote e: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
quote c: 「毅力就是失敗 19 次，仍在第 20 次成功。」
author: Julie Andrews

quote e: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quote c: 「每天做一件讓你害怕的事。」
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote e: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quote c: 「過去與未來都微不足道，真正重要的是我們內在的力量。」
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote e: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quote c: 「機會不是等來的，是你創造的。」
author: Chris Grosser

quote e: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quote c: 「困難常常是在為平凡的人準備不平凡的命運。」
author: C. S. Lewis

quote e: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quote c: 「別等鐵熱才敲，敲下去，鐵自然會熱。」
author: William Butler Yeats

quote e: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quote c: 「成功通常會來找那些忙到沒空找成功的人。」
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote e: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quote c: 「能量與堅持能征服一切。」
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote e: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
quote c: 「相信你無限的潛能，真正的限制來自你自己。」
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote e: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quote c: 「讓臉朝向陽光，陰影就會落在身後。」
author: Walt Whitman

quote e: We become what we think about.
quote c: 「我們會成為自己常常思考的樣子。」
author: Earl Nightingale

quote e: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quote c: 「開始的方法就是停止空談，立刻行動。」
author: Walt Disney

quote e: Nothing will work unless you do.
quote c: 「如果你不去做，什麼都不會發生。」
author: Maya Angelou

quote e: It’s never too late to be what you might have been.
quote c: 「成為你本可以成為的樣子，永遠不嫌晚。」
author: George Eliot

quote e: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quote c: 「你永遠不會太老，不能再立一個新目標或新夢想。」
author: C. S. Lewis

quote e: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quote c: 「成功就是從一次失敗走向下一次失敗，仍不失熱情。」
author: Winston Churchill

quote e: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quote c: 「人生最大的榮耀不是不跌倒，而是每次跌倒都能再站起來。」
author: Nelson Mandela

quote e: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
quote c: 「在你還不知道得更多時，先盡力做到最好，知道更多後，就做得更好。」
author: Maya Angelou

quote e: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quote c: 「你不必很厲害才開始，但你必須開始才會很厲害。」
author: Zig Ziglar

quote e: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quote c: 「移山的人，是從搬走小石頭開始的。」
author: Confucius

quote e: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quote c: 「把傷口變成智慧。」
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote e: Light tomorrow with today.
quote c: 「用今天點亮明天。」
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote e: Confidence comes from discipline and training.
quote c: 「自信來自自律與訓練。」
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote e: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quote c: 「困難之中藏著機會。」
author: Albert Einstein

quote e: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you’ll be criticized anyway.
quote c: 「做你心中認為對的事，因為不管怎樣你都會被評論。」
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote e: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quote c: 「眼望星空，腳踏實地。」
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote e: Hope is a waking dream.
quote c: 「希望是清醒時的夢。」
author: Aristotle

quote e: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
quote c: 「不是你掌控一天，就是一天掌控你。」
author: Jim Rohn

quote e: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quote c: 「行動是所有成功的基石。」
author: Pablo Picasso

quote e: Well begun is half done.
quote c: 「好的開始是成功的一半。」
author: Aristotle

quote e: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
quote c: 「別限制你的挑戰，去挑戰你的極限。」
author: Unknown

quote e: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
quote c: 「你越努力，就越幸運。」
author: Gary Player

quote e: Success is a series of small wins.
quote c: 「成功是一連串小小的勝利。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quote c: 「活得像明天就會死，學得像你會永遠活著。」
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote e: Make each day your masterpiece.
quote c: 「讓每一天都成為你的傑作。」
author: John Wooden

quote e: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quote c: 「別走別人走過的路，去沒有路的地方，走出自己的路。」
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote e: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quote c: 「成功不在於你擁有什麼，而在於你成為了誰。」
author: Bo Bennett

quote e: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'
quote c: 「沒有不可能，因為 ‘impossible’ 本身就寫著 ‘I’m possible’。」
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote e: Do small things with great love.
quote c: 「用很大的愛去做小事。」
author: Mother Teresa

quote e: Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded.
quote c: 「多走一里路，那裡從不擁擠。」
author: Wayne Dyer

quote e: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
quote c: 「成功是你跌到谷底時反彈的高度。」
author: George S. Patton

quote e: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quote c: 「想讓自己站起來，就去扶起別人。」
author: Booker T. Washington

quote e: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quote c: 「實現明天的唯一阻礙，是今天的懷疑。」
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote e: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
quote c: 「努力到讓人無法忽視你。」
author: Steve Martin

quote e: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear.
quote c: 「耐心與毅力有種魔力，能讓困難消散。」
author: John Quincy Adams

quote e: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quote c: 「從不犯錯的人，從未嘗試新事物。」
author: Albert Einstein

quote e: Work gives you meaning and purpose, and life is empty without it.
quote c: 「工作賦予意義與目的，沒有它人生就空了。」
author: Stephen Hawking

quote e: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
quote c: 「沒有熱情，就沒有偉大的成就。」
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote e: I can, therefore I am.
quote c: 「我能，所以我在。」
author: Simone Weil

quote e: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
quote c: 「成功是得到你想要的，幸福是喜歡你得到的。」
author: Dale Carnegie

quote e: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quote c: 「別被腦中的恐懼推著走，要被心中的夢想帶領。」
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote e: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quote c: 「投資知識，回報最高。」
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote e: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quote c: 「別讓你做不到的事，妨礙你能做到的事。」
author: John Wooden

quote e: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
quote c: 「如果你正走在地獄裡，那就繼續走。」
author: Winston Churchill

quote e: You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
quote c: 「你一定要去做你以為做不到的事。」
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote e: The best revenge is massive success.
quote c: 「最好的反擊，就是巨大的成功。」
author: Frank Sinatra

quote e: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quote c: 「成功是喜歡自己、喜歡所做的事、也喜歡你做事的方式。」
author: Maya Angelou

quote e: Do what you love and the money will follow.
quote c: 「做你熱愛的事，錢會跟著來。」
author: Marsha Sinetar

quote e: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quote c: 「我沒有失敗，只是找到一萬種行不通的方法。」
author: Thomas Edison

quote e: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quote c: 「人生像騎腳踏車，想保持平衡就得一直前進。」
author: Albert Einstein

quote e: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quote c: 「對明天最好的準備，就是把今天做到最好。」
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote e: Success is the ability to go from one failure to another without losing enthusiasm.
quote c: 「成功是一次次失敗仍不失熱情的能力。」
author: Winston Churchill

quote e: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quote c: 「人生不會因為運氣變好，而是因為改變變好。」
author: Jim Rohn

quote e: Do not be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quote c: 「別害怕放下好的，去追求更好的。」
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote e: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
quote c: 「如果機會不敲門，就自己造一扇門。」
author: Milton Berle

quote e: Success is a decision.
quote c: 「成功是一個決定。」
author: Unknown

quote e: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quote c: 「平凡與不凡的差別，就在那一點點多做。」
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote e: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quote c: 「每一次落空，都讓我更接近下一次全壘打。」
author: Babe Ruth

quote e: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
quote c: 「求知若飢，虛心若愚。」
author: Steve Jobs

quote e: We rise by lifting others.
quote c: 「扶起別人，也是在抬高自己。」
author: Robert Ingersoll

quote e: Success is not for the chosen few, but for the few who choose it.
quote c: 「成功不是給少數天選之人，而是給那些選擇它的人。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
quote c: 「別數日子，要讓日子有價值。」
author: Muhammad Ali

quote e: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quote c: 「無論走到哪裡，都要全心投入。」
author: Confucius

quote e: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quote c: 「只要可能就要善良，而善良永遠可能。」
author: Dalai Lama

quote e: Keep your mind on the solution, not the problem.
quote c: 「把心思放在解法，而不是問題上。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quote c: 「成功不在於你爬得多高，而在於你為世界帶來多少正向改變。」
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote e: The best way out is always through.
quote c: 「走出困境最好的方式，就是穿越它。」
author: Robert Frost

quote e: Make your life a mission, not an intermission.
quote c: 「讓人生是一場使命，而不是一段插曲。」
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote e: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
quote c: 「相信你自己，以及你所擁有的一切。」
author: Christian D. Larson

quote e: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
quote c: 「你最大的機會，可能就在你此刻所在之處。」
author: Napoleon Hill

quote e: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
quote c: 「別等待，時機永遠不會完美。」
author: Napoleon Hill

quote e: Do what you can today to improve all your tomorrows.
quote c: 「今天做你能做的，讓所有明天更好。」
author: Ralph Marston

quote e: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal.
quote c: 「成功是逐步實現有價值的目標。」
author: Earl Nightingale

quote e: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quote c: 「你注定成為的人，是你決定要成為的人。」
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote e: Don’t be discouraged. It’s often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
quote c: 「別灰心，常常是最後一把鑰匙才打開鎖。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Do what is right, not what is easy.
quote c: 「做對的事，不是做容易的事。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Set your goals high, and don’t stop till you get there.
quote c: 「把目標訂高，直到達成前都別停。」
author: Bo Jackson

quote e: Success is a stairway, not a doorway.
quote c: 「成功是一段階梯，不是一扇門。」
author: Dottie Walters

quote e: Find a way, not an excuse.
quote c: 「找方法，不找藉口。」
author: Unknown

quote e: The comeback is always stronger than the setback.
quote c: 「逆轉永遠比挫折更強大。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Do the right thing even when no one is looking.
quote c: 「即使沒人看見，也要做對的事。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quote c: 「成為你想在世界上看見的改變。」
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote e: Confidence is contagious. So is lack of confidence.
quote c: 「自信會傳染，不自信也是。」
author: Vince Lombardi

quote e: Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quote c: 「成功來自準備、努力，以及從失敗中學習。」
author: Colin Powell

quote e: Do not let yesterday take up too much of today.
quote c: 「別讓昨天佔據了今天太多。」
author: Will Rogers

quote e: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
quote c: 「重要的不是你被打倒，而是你是否站起來。」
author: Vince Lombardi

quote e: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
quote c: 「你無法改變起點，但可以從此刻改變結局。」
author: C. S. Lewis

quote e: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.
quote c: 「冠軍怕輸，其他人怕贏。」
author: Billie Jean King

quote e: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
quote c: 「失敗是更聰明地再開始的機會。」
author: Henry Ford

quote e: Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
quote c: 「不是所有事情都能改變，但不面對就無法改變。」
author: James Baldwin

quote e: Do not go through life, grow through life.
quote c: 「不要只是過日子，要在日子裡成長。」
author: Eric Butterworth

quote e: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quote c: 「在小事上忠實，因為力量就藏在其中。」
author: Mother Teresa

quote e: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quote c: 「今天的痛，會成為明天的力量。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Where there is hope, there is life.
quote c: 「哪裡有希望，哪裡就有生命。」
author: Anne Frank

quote e: Success is getting up one more time than you fall.
quote c: 「成功就是比跌倒多站起來一次。」
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote e: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take.
quote c: 「別因為需要時間，就放棄夢想。」
author: Earl Nightingale

quote e: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you’ll see obstacles.
quote c: 「相信會成，你就會看見機會，相信不會成，你就會看見障礙。」
author: Wayne Dyer

quote e: Be so focused on your goals that you forget your fears.
quote c: 「專注到忘了恐懼。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
quote c: 「安靜地努力，讓成功替你發聲。」
author: Frank Ocean

quote e: Your direction is more important than your speed.
quote c: 「方向比速度更重要。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Success is the best motivator.
quote c: 「成功是最好的動力。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Do not underestimate yourself. You are capable of more than you imagine.
quote c: 「別小看自己，你比想像中更有能力。」
author: Unknown

quote e: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.
quote c: 「最大的風險，是不冒任何風險。」
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote e: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quote c: 「偉大的事不會在舒適圈裡發生。」
author: Unknown

quote e: If you want to fly, give up what weighs you down.
quote c: 「想飛，就放下讓你沉重的東西。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quote c: 「自律是在『現在想要』與『最想要』之間做選擇。」
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote e: Do one thing at a time, and do it well.
quote c: 「一次做好一件事。」
author: Steve Jobs

quote e: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
quote c: 「每天不一定都好，但每天都有好事。」
author: Alice Morse Earle

quote e: Nothing worth having comes easy.
quote c: 「值得擁有的，從不容易。」
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote e: Start each day with a grateful heart.
quote c: 「每天用感恩的心開始。」
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote e: Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
quote c: 「你的心很強大，當你充滿正向想法，人生就會改變。」
author: Unknown

quote e: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
quote c: 「你現在的你與理想的你，差別在你做了什麼。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
quote c: 「累了別停，做完再停。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Success is the child of audacity.
quote c: 「成功是大膽的孩子。」
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote e: Be kind to yourself. You’re doing the best you can.
quote c: 「對自己好一點，你已經盡力了。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Life becomes easier when you learn to accept the apology you never got.
quote c: 「當你學會接受那句沒等到的道歉，生活就輕鬆了。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.
quote c: 「自信地朝夢想前進。」
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote e: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quote c: 「把局面做到最好的人，往往得到最好的結果。」
author: John Wooden

quote e: Do not be afraid of growing slowly; be afraid only of standing still.
quote c: 「不怕走得慢，只怕停下來。」
author: Chinese Proverb

quote e: Success is a mindset. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
quote c: 「成功是一種心態，想成功，就先把自己當成成功的人。」
author: Joyce Brothers

quote e: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quote c: 「你不必看見整個樓梯，只要踏出第一步。」
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote e: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work.
quote c: 「機會常常偽裝成辛苦的工作。」
author: Thomas Edison

quote e: One day you will thank yourself for not giving up.
quote c: 「有一天你會感謝自己沒有放棄。」
author: Unknown

quote e: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quote c: 「你越讚美與珍惜生活，生活就越有值得慶祝的事。」
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote e: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
quote c: 「成功不是偶爾為之，而是持續為之。」
author: Marie Forleo

quote e: Do it with passion or not at all.
quote c: 「要嘛熱情去做，要嘛別做。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Stay positive, better days are on their way.
quote c: 「保持正向，更好的日子正在來。」
author: Unknown

quote e: The best project you’ll ever work on is you.
quote c: 「你一生最重要的作品，就是你自己。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Your life is as good as your mindset.
quote c: 「你的生活好不好，取決於你的心態。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
quote c: 「夢想不會自己實現，除非你去做。」
author: John C. Maxwell

quote e: Success is a journey, not a destination.
quote c: 「成功是一段旅程，不是終點。」
author: Ben Sweetland

quote e: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
quote c: 「繼續走，你需要的一切會在對的時候到來。」
author: Unknown

quote e: Do not wait for opportunity. Create it.
quote c: 「別等機會，去創造它。」
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote e: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quote c: 「成功的關鍵，是專注目標而非障礙。」
author: Unknown
